name: flickr.photos.comments.getList
description: Returns the comments for a photo
authentication: This method does not require authentication.

arguments.name: api_key
arguments.description: Your API application key.See herefor more details.

arguments.name: photo_id
arguments.description: The id of the photo to fetch comments for.

arguments.name: min_comment_date
arguments.description: Minimum date that a a comment was added. The date should be in the form of a unix timestamp.

arguments.name: max_comment_date
arguments.description: Maximum date that a comment was added. The date should be in the form of a unix timestamp.
